about_the_game:
Soulstone Survivors is an action roguelite where you slay hordes of foes and face titanic bosses while learning powerful skills to enhance your character. Play as a Void Hunter, and with the spoils of every match craft weapons, unlock new characters, upgrade your skill tree and equip new runes, all in your quest for godlike powers.

With deep RPG mechanics intertwined with Roguelite elements, Soulstone Survivors offers a condensed, yet deep Action RPG experience.

HUNDREDS OF UNIQUE SKILLS

Soulstone Survivors gives you the freedom to shape your gameplay with over 350 active skills across multiple characters. Whether you crave raw power or strategic mastery, you can craft your perfect build and dominate the battlefield your way.

CHALLENGE TITANS

Prepare for battle against titanic bosses that will push your skills to the limit. These massive foes will demand all your skill and strategy to overcome their overwhelming power.

MASSIVE SKILL TREE

The skill tree is vast and diverse, allowing each character to stand out with their own ultimate abilities. Customize your experience, enhance your playstyle, and enjoy a unique journey with every hero you choose.

UNIQUE PLAYABLE CHARACTERS

With 18 distinct characters to master, Soulstone Survivors offers unparalleled variety. Each Void Hunter comes equipped with unique weapons, abilities, and specializations, giving you endless ways to conquer your foes.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR BUILD

Pick from dozens of powerful runes to shape your path from the start, and create unstoppable, game-breaking synergies by combining them with hundreds of passive skills.

CRAFT POWERFUL WEAPONS

Forge unique weapons for your Void Hunters and unlock powerful new abilities, allowing you to push your characters’ playstyles even further, giving you endless ways to fine-tune your approach.

MAPS AND GAME MODES

You’re in control of your challenges. Select from numerous curses and different game modes to ramp up the difficulty and explore new ways to test your mastery in every run.

SPECIAL THANKS TO THE COMMUNITY

We are a tiny team that chose to stay independent and continue developing the game we love, and would like to thank each and every one of you that has helped us along the way! Soulstone Survivors would not be the same without your feedback!

Also check out our other game!


About the Demo

Soulstone Survivors is an action roguelite where you slay hordes of foes and face titanic bosses while learning powerful skills to enhance your character. Play as a Void Hunter, and with the spoils of every match craft weapons, unlock new characters, upgrade your skill tree and equip new runes, all in your quest for godlike powers.

The skill tree is vast and diverse, allowing each character to stand out with their own ultimate abilities. Customize your experience, enhance your playstyle, and enjoy a unique journey with every hero you choose.

With 18 distinct characters to master, Soulstone Survivors offers unparalleled variety. Each Void Hunter comes equipped with unique weapons, abilities, and specializations, giving you endless ways to conquer your foes.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux/X11
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13.0+
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

name: Soulstone Survivors Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Face the Lords of the Void and their endless minions, collect their Soulstones and become a god! In this Action Roguelite, unveil secret spells, craft mighty weapons, unlock multiple characters, discover game-breaking synergies and conquer the power of the void.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
